title: Mr. CEOooooooo
description: "It's time to get a taste of what I'm paying for." One look at her walking through the halls of my office has me hooked.She's my new secretary and she'll have to obey my every command.Follow my strict dress code.And there's no experience required, in fact, her inexperience is preferred.Because I'm going to show her how a real alpha boss does it.I'm going to show her why they call me Mr. CEOooooooo.You down with OTT? This is an Olivia T. Turner book, which means it features a possessive and totally obsessed Over The Top alpha male who isn't afraid to take what he wants! If you like your book boyfriends sweet and cuddly then shut the computer off and walk away. If you like your heroes, rough, dirty, and possessive to the extreme, come on in and have some fun...
author: Olivia T. Turner
